article_title: GC Cheat Sheet: The Hottest Corporate News Of The Week
article_text:
GC Cheat Sheet: The Hottest Corporate News Of The Week

Law360, New York (February 19, 2016, 10:44 PM ET) -- Too busy to keep up with the news last week? Here are the corporate developments you might have missed, from a new tax treaty to a new Dodd-Frank-mandated rule.



1. Justice Scalia's Unfinished Business



The death of U.S. Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia left a host of corporate legal questions in limbo and turned a few foregone conclusions on their heads, according to experts who weighed in last week.



Among them?



The court has already heard oral arguments in high-profile cases on college affirmative action policies and...
